arStrings.szText:
Used by the Occultist to craft a Nightmare Sigil to enter Glacial Fissure. Requires {c_number}9{/c}. Collected from Tier 30+ Nightmare Dungeons.

Drops randomly from Elites, Treasure Goblins, Local Events, Whisper Caches, Hellborne, and Blood Maiden.
An ink that reflects no light. You find yourself acutely aware of your own mortality.
